ID.description: Section: Study Details | Guidance: Study ID

extractor.description: Section: Study Details | Guidance: Initials of extractor

first_author.description: Section: Study Details | Guidance: First author's last name

pub_year.description: Section: Study Details | Guidance: Publication year

country.description: Section: Study Details | Guidance: Country/Countries where study was conducted

study_design.description: Section: Study Characteristics | Guidance: Study Design (for case reports or small series, use the case report form)

aims.description: Section: Study Characteristics | Guidance: Aims of the Study

participant_number.description: Section: Study Characteristics | Guidance: Number of participants

age_central_measure.description:
Section: Study Characteristics | Guidance: Age - measure of central tendency. Select one of the following:
- mean
- median
NA = not available, NA, not reported

age_central.description: Section: Study Characteristics | Guidance: Age - value of central tendency (numeric)

age_variability_measure.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Guidance: Age - measure of variability (listed in order of preference)

SD = standard deviation (1st preference)
SE = standard error (2nd)
95CI = 95% confidence interval (3rd)
IQR = interquartile range
range = range (5th)
NA = not available, not reported (6th)

age_variability.description: Section: Population Characteristics | Guidance: Age - value(s) of variability

ethnicity.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Guidance: Ethnicity (select one)
- white = White/Caucasian
- africa = African/ Afro-Caribbean
- E_asia = East Asia (Japan, Korea, China)
- S_asia = South Asia (India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka)
- SE_asia = South East Asian (everything East of India and South of China which will cover Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore)
- latin = Latin American (non-African origin; central and S America, without Caribbean)
- other = other (specify in next column)

ethnicity_specify.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Guidance: Ethnicity (specify)
If you selected "other", specify with text. Otherwise leave blank.

percent_males.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Guidance: Percent Males
Male patients/Total patients. List the value to two decimal places (e.g. "45.55")

included_diagnosis.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Guidance: Diagnosis of participants included (select)
- Stiff_Person
- Stiff_Limb
- PERM
- new_category = new category if identified, specify
- mixed = mixed population
- other = other, specify in next column
- NA = not available, NA, not reported

included_diagnosis_specify.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Guidance: Diagnosis (specify)
If you selected new_category or other, specify with text

diagnostic_criteria.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Guidance: Criteria used to make the diagnosis
Provide below the details of the criteria used to make the diagnosis - copy and paste from text if needed (no special characters)

disease_severity.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Guidance: Disease Severity
If the study recruited patients with a specified severity - Copy and paste from manuscript the explanation of severity and how this was defined.

first_manifestation.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Guidance: First manifestation
If study reports first symptoms of a group of participants, copy and paste below from the manuscript. If details for individual cases provided, use case report form.

spsd_symptom.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: SPSD symptoms in early disease (select)
- stiffness
- spasms
- startle = excessive startle
- multiple = multiple, specify in next col
- other = other, specify in next col

spsd_symptom_multiple.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Additional data for previous column - if multiple symptoms reported
List symptoms as text, separated with semicolons. Otherwise, leave blank.

spsd_symptom_other.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Additional data for previous column - if other symptoms reported
List symptoms as text, separated with semicolons. Otherwise, leave blank.

stiffness_onset_distribution.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Stiffness distribution at onset (select)
- lumb_prox_LE = lumbar/proximal legs
- distal_LE = distal leg(s)
- UE = arm(s) / upper extremity
- axial = axial(thoracic,neck)
- multiple = multiple, but not generalised (specify in next col)
- generalised = generalised
- other = other, specify in next col

stiffness_onset_distribution_multiple.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Stiffness at onset (multiple)
If "multiple" was selected, list as text, separated by semicolons. Otherwise, leave blank.

stiffness_onset_distribution_other.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Stiffness at onset (other)
If "other" was selected, specify with text. Otherwise, leave blank.

startle_stimulus.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Excessive startle (select)
- touch = to touch
- noise = to noise
- visual = to visual stimuli

symptoms_established.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: SPSD symptoms in established disease (select single option from list)
- stiffness
- spasms
- startle = excessive startle
- anxiety
- oculomotor = oculomotor disturbance
- cerebellar
- visual = visual symptoms (e.g. photosensitivity)
- cognitive
- gastrointestinal = other than abdominal wall muscle cramps)
- multiple = multiple, specify in next col
- other = other, specify in overnext col

symptoms_established_multiple.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: SPSD symptoms in established disease (multiple)
If "multiple" was selected, list as text, separated by semicolons. Otherwise, leave blank.

symptoms_established_other.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: SPSD symptoms in established disease (other)
If "other" was selected, list as text. Otherwise, leave blank.

stiffness_established_distribution.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Stiffness distribution in established disease (select)
- lumb_prox_LE = lumbar/proximal legs
- distal_LE = distal leg(s)
- UE = arm(s) / upper extremity
- axial = axial(thoracic,neck)
- trismus
- multiple = multiple, but not generalised
- generalised = generalised
- other = other, specify in next col

stiffness_established_distribution_multi.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: SPSD distribution in established disease (multiple)
If "multiple" was selected, list as text, separated by semicolons. Otherwise, leave blank.

stiffness_established_distribution_other.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: SPSD distribution in established disease (other)
If "other" was selected, list as text, separated by semicolons. Otherwise, leave blank.

established_mRS.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Disability when disease fully established
(SPSD symptoms established; mRS)
0 - No symptoms.
1 - No significant disability.
2 - Slight disability.
3 - Moderate disability.
4 - Moderately severe disability.
5 - Severe disability.  incontinent.
6 - Dead

spasms_distribution.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Spasms distribution
- lumb_prox_LE = lumbar/proximal legs
- distal_LE = distal leg(s)
- UE = arm(s) / upper extremity
- axial = axial(thoracic,neck)
- multiple = multiple, but not generalised
- generalised = generalised
- other = other, specify in next col

spasms_distribution_multiple.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Spasms distribution (multiple)
If "multiple" was selected, list as text, separated by semicolons. Otherwise, leave blank.

spasms_distribution_other.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Spasms distribution (other)
If "other" was selected, list as text. Otherwise, leave blank.

FU_duration.description: Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Duration of follow up (months)

treatment.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Course / symptoms potentially influenced by treatment ? (select)
- none = no treatment
- BZD = benzodiazepine or similar
- immunotherapy
- both = both symptomatic and immunotherapy
- NA = not available, not reported

antibody_status.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Antibody status (select)
- GAD
- GlyR
- amphiphysin
- DPPX
- seronegative
- multiple = multiple, specify in next col
- other = other, specify in next col
- not_tested = no test performed
- NA = not available, not reported, unclear if tested

antibody_status_multiple.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Antibody status (multiple)
If "multiple" was selected, list as text, separated by semicolons. Otherwise, leave blank.

antibody_status_other.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Antibody status (other)
If "other" was selected, list as text. Otherwise, leave blank.

antibody_titre.description: Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Antibody titre

antibody_units.description: Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Antibody units

antibody_testsystem.description: Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Antibody test system

antibody_tests.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Antibodies tested
list all antibodies that were tested, separated by semicolons

antibody_notes.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: Antibody notes
If not covered by columns to the left, give as text note. Otherwise, leave blank.

CSF_status.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: CSF (select)
- normal
- inflammatory
- isolated protein elevation
- not_done = no CSF analysis performed
- antibody_present = antibody present in CSF (specify Ab and titre in next cols)
- NA = not available / NA

CSF_antibody.description: Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: CSF antibody (specify)

CSF_antibody_titre.description: Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: CSF antibody titre (numeric)

CMUA.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: continuous motor unit activity (CMUA)
0 = not detected
1 = present
NA = no EMG, NA, unknown

exteroceptive_refl.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Guidance: enhanced exteroceptive reflexes
0 = not detected
1 = present
NA = not done, NA, unknown

brainstem_refl.description:
Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: brainstem reflexes
0 = not detected
1 = present
NA = not done, NA, unknown

MRI_normal.description:
Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: MRI
0 = normal
1 = abnormal (specify in next col)
NA = no MRI performed, not reported, unclear

MRI_abnormalities.description: Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: MRI abnormalities (text)

tu_screening.description:
Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: Tumour screening
0 = normal / no tumour detected
1 = abnormal (specify in next col)
NA = not performed, NA

tu_screening_abnormal.description:
Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: Tumour screening abnormal
specify tumour entity with text

family_history.description:
Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: Family history (select)
- none = no fhx for SPSD or autoimmunity
- autoimmune = fhx for autoimmunity (specify in next col)
- SPSD = fhx for SPSD (specify in next col)
- NA = unknown, not reported

family_history_abnormal.description:
Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: Family history (text)
if autoimmune diseases and/or SPSD are present, specify with text

autoimmunity.description:
Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: Concomitant autoimmunity (select)
- none
- thyroid = thyroid disease/thyroid antibodies
- diabetes
- vitiligo
- gastric = pernicious anaemia/parietal cell antibodies
- other= other, specify in next col

autoimmunity_specify.description: Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: Concomitant autoimmunity (specify with text)

immunotherapy.description:
Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: Immunotherapy (specify)
- none = not done
- steroids
- IVIG
- PLEX
- RXB = Rituximab
- CP = Cyclophosphamide
- Aza = Azathioprine
- multiple = specify in next col
- other = specify in next col
- NA = unknown, NA

immunotherapy_multiple.description: Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: If more than one type of treatment, report here from previous column

immunotherapy_other.description: Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: If other treatment, report here from previous column

immunotherapy_detail.description:
Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: Immunotherapy in detail (text)
report the immunotherapy protocol in detail

immunotherapy_effect.description:
Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: Effect of immunotherapy (select)
- none
- worsening
- improvement
- stabilisation
- NA = not known

sympt_treatment.description:
Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: Symptomatic treatment (select)
- none
- clonazepam
- benzo = other benzodiazepines
- baclofen
- gabapentin
- pregabalin
- tizanidine
- valproate
- other (specify)

sympt_treatment_multiple.description: Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: If more than one type of symptomatic treatment, report here from previous column, separate with semicolons

sympt_treatment_other.description: Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: If other symptomatic treatment, report here from previous column

sympt_treatment_detail.description:
Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: Symptomatic treatment in detail (text)
please describe way of administration and dose

sympt_treatment_effect.description:
Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: Effect of symptomatic treatment (select)
- none
- improvement
- NA = not known, NA

other_treatment.description:
Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: Other treatment (text)
(e.g. tumour therapy)

different_treatment.description: Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: If treatment description does not fit the previous columns, specify the treatment as text and use the next columns to provide details.

different_treatment_duration.description: Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: Different treatment: duration (days)

different_treatment_response.description: Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: Different treatment: response (text)

different_treatment_extra.description: Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: Results of treatment, if more than one type of response and differential responses to types of treatments

adverse_events.description:
Section: Investigations and Tests | Guidance: Adverse events (text)
Copy paste the definition(s) of adverse events if one is provided by the authors.

sampling.description:
Section: Sampling and Analysis | Guidance: Sampling (text)
Copy from methods how recruitment was performed, such as single site or multicentric, consecutive patients, clinic, community, and other details.

sample_size_calc.description:
Section: Sampling and Analysis | Guidance: Sample size calculation, study power (text)
Does the study provide a sample size calculation, power,   and other additional information about sampling and analysis? Copy and pasted if available.

stat_methods.description:
Section: Sampling and Analysis | Guidance: Analysis (text)
Statistical tests used to find the results - Copy and pasted if available.

additional_relevant.description: Section: Additional Relevant Information | Guidance: Use this column to add any finding or comments that can be relevant

limitations.description: Section: Additional Relevant Information | Guidance: Use this column to make comments related to study limitations

weaknesses.description: Section: Notes | Guidance: Use this column to make comments related to study weaknesses

strengths.description: Section: Notes | Guidance: Use this column to make comments related to study strengths.

initial_diagnosis.description:
Section: Notes | Guidance: Initial diagnosis (text)
state which diagnosis was suspected at symptom onset (SPSD or specific other diagnosis)

differential_diagnosis.description:
Section: Notes | Guidance: Differential diagnosis (text)
Which DDx were considered?
